product_actives: Nourishing benefits of honey and the calming properties of sage
product_short_description: It's lightweight, non-greasy formula ensures it feels comfortable on your skin while providing long-lasting defense against harmful sun exposure.
product_long_description: Discover the ultimate protection for your skin with our SPF 50+++ Sage and Honey Sunscreen. Formulated with the nourishing benefits of honey and the calming properties of sage, this sunscreen offers superior broad-spectrum protection against UVA and UVB rays. Its lightweight, non-greasy formula ensures it feels comfortable on your skin while providing long-lasting defense against harmful sun exposure.

product_short_description: Mint cools and invigorates the skin, while lavender calms and cleanses, creating a harmonious blend that cleanses and relaxes.
product_long_description: Indulge your senses and invigorate your skincare routine with our luxurious Mint and Lavender Cleanser. Crafted with the finest botanical ingredients, this gentle yet effective cleanser is designed to refresh and purify your skin, leaving it feeling clean, soft, and rejuvenated.Formulated with natural ingredients and free from harsh chemicals, our Mint and Lavender Cleanser is suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin. Whether you're starting or ending your day, this cleanser will become an essential part of your skincare ritual, leaving you with a refreshed complexion and a sense of tranquility. Experience the soothing power of nature with every cleanse.
